T02D1672:195a-1: sarba buddha sa ma ya yo g'i ga na bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1672:195b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i @195b tshogs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1672:195b-1: dpal mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1672:195b-2: dpal ldan bde chen sems dpa'i mchog / sangs rgyas sras mchog 'khor lo'i gnas //
T02D1672:195b-3: rnam 'phrul cho ga ston mdzad pa'i //
T02D1672:195b-4: sku gsung dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1672:195b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'i //
T02D1672:195b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1672:195b-7: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog las //
T02D1672:195b-8: tshogs kyi cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1672:195b-9: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1672:195b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba //
T02D1672:195b-11: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1672:195b-12: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1672:195b-13: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pas //
T02D1672:195b-14: kun ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02D1672:195b-15: rigs kyi bkod pa so so'i gnas //
T02D1672:195b-16: phun sum tshogs par bstan pa'am //
T02D1672:195b-17: yang na bde ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D1672:195b-18: skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub //
T02D1672:195b-19: mar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang //
T02D1672:195b-20: yar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu mtshams gnyis //
T02D1672:195b-21: der ni dang po gdan bshams te //
T02D1672:195b-23: sna tshogs padma ras kyis g-yogs //
T02D1672:195b-24: de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan //
T02D1672:195b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal //
T02D1672:195b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba bde //
T02D1672:195b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchog / rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras //
T02D1672:195b-28: dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1672:195b-29: bla re dam pa bres pa na //
T02D1672:195b-30: rdo rje tshig dang mchog la sogs //
T02D1672:195b-31: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
T02D1672:195b-32: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D1672:195b-33: mar me dri la sogs ldan par //
T02D1672:195b-34: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1672:195b-35: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub //
T02D1672:195b-36: slob dpon mgon la legs zhus nas //
T02D1672:195b-37: phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes 'jug cing //
T02D1672:195b-38: sangs rgyas brda dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1672:195b-39: me tog thogs te 'gro la bskul //
T02D1672:195b-40: rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad kun //
T02D1672:195b-41: dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bcas kyis //
T02D1672:195b-42: do nub bdag gi gnas dag tu //
T02D1672:195b-43: tshogs kyi cho ga mdzad par gsol //
T02D1672:195b-44: ae ma bu ni snying rje che //
T02D1672:195b-45: gal te lag pa'i phreng ston na //
T02D1672:195b-46: 'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin //
T02D1672:196a-0: @196a * // phreng ba mngon par btang byas nas //
T02D1672:196a-1: dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang //
T02D1672:196a-2: dpa' bo gzhan don spyod pa'o //
T02D1672:196a-3: de nas nub mo 'dus pa dang //
T02D1672:196a-4: phyi nas 'dag chal dri chab chus //
T02D1672:196a-5: khrus byas me tog gis brgyan cing //
T02D1672:196a-6: rnal 'byor dag chos sngags kyis spyang //
T02D1672:196a-7: de nas nang gi khrus byas te //
T02D1672:196a-8: sngags kyis bsrungs shing byin brlabs nas //
T02D1672:196a-9: dam tshig tshogs rnams ba skad gso zhing //
T02D1672:196a-10: rim bzhin nang du 'gro bar bya //
T02D1672:196a-11: dam tshig brda sogs brtag pa'i phyir //
T02D1672:196a-12: khro bo'i rgyan sngon las mkhan gnyis //
T02D1672:196a-13: rig pa'i sngags brjod tho ba 'dzin //
T02D1672:196a-14: bsrung ba'i don phyir sgo 'gram gnyis //
T02D1672:196a-15: kye khro rgyal sngon dag gis mdzes //
T02D1672:196a-16: dam tshig rnam par spyod pa po //
T02D1672:196a-17: dngos grub rin chen dbyug to 'dzin //
T02D1672:196a-18: dpa' bo dpa' mo 'du bar mdzod //
T02D1672:196a-19: mkha' mdzes rnal 'byor ma dkyil du //
T02D1672:196a-20: dam pa'i mtshan ldan bdag thong shig / aom ma h'a sa ya h'um /
T02D1672:196a-22: rdo rje slob ma chen po dang //
T02D1672:196a-23: rang gi grogs mchog lha rnams la //
T02D1672:196a-24: bskor zhing phyag 'tshal rang nyid kyi //
T02D1672:196a-25: stan la gus pa'i sems kyis 'dug / yon bdag las mkhan gang rung gis //
T02D1672:196a-26: sa gzhi legs bsham dri bcas chus //
T02D1672:196a-27: khru gang la sogs tshad mnyam pa'i //
T02D1672:196a-28: mandala rgyan dang bcas par bsham //
T02D1672:196a-29: rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyis ni //
T02D1672:196a-30: bsang spyang bsrung zhing byin gyis rlob //
T02D1672:196a-31: rig pa chad dag rnam phye la //
T02D1672:196a-32: dkyil 'khor sngags kyis me tog dgram //
T02D1672:196a-35: de yi 'og tu brtsam par bya //
T02D1672:196a-37: yang na gcig tu dgod par bya //
T02D1672:196a-38: dbus su rta mchog lha mo ste //
T02D1672:196a-39: zla gam lha mchog chen po'i gnas //
T02D1672:196a-40: par khyams dang por phyogs skyong lha //
T02D1672:196a-41: gnyis par mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams te //
T02D1672:196a-42: gsum par klu rgyal 'khor bcas tshogs //
T02D1672:196a-43: bzhi par 'gro drug bgegs tshogs so //
T02D1672:196a-44: so so'i las dang mthun pa yi //
T02D1672:196a-45: tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgram par bya //
T02D1672:196a-46: mchod yon mchod tshogs rim gro dang //
T02D1672:196b-0: nya sha la sogs @196b bza' ba dang //
T02D1672:196b-1: chang rtsi myos byed phreng ba dang //
T02D1672:196b-2: g-yon du nye bar dgod par bya //
T02D1672:196b-3: g-yas pa dag tu chu yi snod //
T02D1672:196b-4: ku sha'i chun po nyungs kar bcas //
T02D1672:196b-5: mdun du mchod yon bzed zhal dang //
T02D1672:196b-6: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'i tshogs //
T02D1672:196b-7: mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i shes tshogs rnams //
T02D1672:196b-8: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang po la //
T02D1672:196b-9: mchod pa kun gyi gtor ma'i tshogs //
T02D1672:196b-10: phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02D1672:196b-12: bgod de bsrung spyang shis par bya //
T02D1672:196b-13: bsod nams tshogs kyis dag byas nas //
T02D1672:196b-14: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1672:196b-15: gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1672:196b-16: dam tshig dkyil 'khor sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1672:196b-17: bsgom pa'i yan lag ma nyams par //
T02D1672:196b-18: rigs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1672:196b-19: ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing //
T02D1672:196b-20: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'i //
T02D1672:196b-22: chang la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams //
T02D1672:196b-23: mdun nas phyag tu ci rigs dbul //
T02D1672:196b-24: ltos shig rnal 'byor rgyan mdzes rnams //
T02D1672:196b-25: 'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin //
T02D1672:196b-26: bram ze khyi dang gdol pa rnams //
T02D1672:196b-27: rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza' ;
T02D1672:196b-28: / aom ma h'a sa ma ya /
T02D1672:196b-29: ku ru ku ru dha ro ku ru h'um phat /
T02D1672:196b-30: bde gshegs de ni sdig med cing //
T02D1672:196b-31: 'dod chags sogs pa'i skyon dang bral //
T02D1672:196b-32: gzung 'dzin dri ma rnam par spangs //
T02D1672:196b-33: de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1672:196b-34: g-yas dang g-yon gyi lag gnyis kyis //
T02D1672:196b-35: padma'i bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02D1672:196b-36: rol par bcas pas bza' ba bzung //
T02D1672:196b-37: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1672:196b-38: ji bzhin du ni 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1672:196b-39: rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas //
T02D1672:196b-40: chang sogs rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab //
T02D1672:196b-41: g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i gzugs can dang //
T02D1672:196b-42: khyad par du ni bskor ba nyid //
T02D1672:196b-43: shel gyi gzugs kyis byin brlab cing //
T02D1672:196b-44: thams cad bdud rtsi'i ngo bor brtag / de nyid yang dag spyod pa 'dis //
T02D1672:196b-45: rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag / ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya //
T02D1672:196b-46: sgyu ma lta bu mdzes pa yi //
T02D1672:197a-2: / sems can don du yang dag spyad //
T02D1672:197a-3: de nas mna' ni bsgags byas nas //
T02D1672:197a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yi //
T02D1672:197a-5: mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa //
T02D1672:197a-6: dam tshig dam pa sbyin par bya //
T02D1672:197a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam spyor ba'i //
T02D1672:197a-8: sngom pa nyams par khyed byed pa //
T02D1672:197a-9: ji snyad sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D1672:197a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1672:197a-11: lha dag dang ni mi dag dang //
T02D1672:197a-12: de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1672:197a-13: de dag la ni snying ring nas //
T02D1672:197a-14: snying nas khrag chen 'thungs pa yin //
T02D1672:197a-15: bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing //
T02D1672:197a-16: dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya //
T02D1672:197a-17: ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad //
T02D1672:197a-18: 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1672:197a-19: rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la //
T02D1672:197a-20: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D1672:197a-21: sdig med stobs kyis khyod ma 'jigs //
T02D1672:197a-23: tshogs kyi dpa' po'i ston mo las //
T02D1672:197a-24: slob dpon las kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1672:197a-25: de nas khrus byas dri yi lus //
T02D1672:197a-26: ji ltar 'byor pa'i gos dang rgyan //
T02D1672:197a-27: sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas ni //
T02D1672:197a-28: me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
T02D1672:197a-29: sems can khams ni ma lus don //
T02D1672:197a-30: srid pa shin du dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1672:197a-31: mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis //
T02D1672:197a-32: mnyam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya //
T02D1672:197a-33: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1672:197a-34: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
T02D1672:197a-35: rdo rje rin chen padmo sogs //
T02D1672:197a-36: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02D1672:197a-37: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1672:197a-38: bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pas //
T02D1672:197a-39: skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D1672:197a-40: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02D1672:197a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1672:197a-42: sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul bas //
T02D1672:197a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02D1672:197a-44: de ni rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad //
T02D1672:197a-45: brtan zhing grub pa'i slong byed pa //
T02D1672:197a-46: kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni //
T02D1672:197a-47: song pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus //
T02D1672:197a-48: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas //
T02D1672:197a-49: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1672:197a-50: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
T02D1672:197b-0: @197b aom ae hye ti bha ga b'an mh'a k'a
T02D1672:197b-1: ru ni ka tri shya ho sa ma ya stvam:dza:h'um:
T02D1672:197b-3: de nas yang dag rab gsal bas //
T02D1672:197b-4: bud med dag ni bzhi rnams la //
T02D1672:197b-5: gar gyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
T02D1672:197b-6: mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1672:197b-8: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1672:197b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod //
T02D1672:197b-10: dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1672:197b-11: mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod //
T02D1672:197b-12: mchod pa chan po thams cad grub par mdzad //
T02D1672:197b-13: glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal //
T02D1672:197b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te //
T02D1672:197b-15: mchod pham lus byed pa yi //
T02D1672:197b-16: rab 'byams las la sbyor du rung //
T02D1672:197b-17: gang dag grub par ma gyur dang //
T02D1672:197b-18: mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor ba //
T02D1672:197b-19: phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas nas //
T02D1672:197b-20: mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub //
T02D1672:197b-21: de nas ro mchog bza' btung nas //
T02D1672:197b-22: glu tshig sil snyan la sogs pa //
T02D1672:197b-23: de dag mgon po rnams la dbul //
T02D1672:197b-24: dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas dbyer med blos //
T02D1672:197b-25: rdo rje bla ma chen po dang //
T02D1672:197b-26: bdag gzhan chogs la 'dod dgus mchod //
T02D1672:197b-27: rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
T02D1672:197b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
T02D1672:197b-30: rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi
T02D1672:197b-31: sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas
T02D1672:197b-32: pa // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma
T02D1672:197b-33: bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par
T02D1672:197b-35: rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
T02D1672:197b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
T02D1672:197b-37: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um /
T02D1672:197b-38: rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa ;
T02D1672:197b-39: / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde
T02D1672:197b-40: mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul
T02D1672:197b-41: // ham shi shva ba shvi h'um /
T02D1672:197b-42: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D1672:197b-44: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1672:197b-46: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1672:197b-47: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1672:197b-48: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1672:198a-2: sarba karmasu tsa me tsi ttam /
T02D1672:198a-9: mah'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02D1672:198a-10: de nas zos shing 'thungs pa yi //
T02D1672:198a-11: lhag ma'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te //
T02D1672:198a-12: gong du bkod pa'i gtor ma dang //
T02D1672:198a-13: so sor byin brlabs bsngo bar bya //
T02D1672:198a-14: ha ho hr'i:yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1672:198a-15: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dod lnga'i tshogs //
T02D1672:198a-16: mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams gnas //
T02D1672:198a-17: sngags bcas mgron tshogs bsdu bar bya //
T02D1672:198a-18: aom ha hi ru lu ru lu dza:h'um bam ho:badzra d'a ki ni bhyo //
T02D1672:198a-19: ae aa ra li ho dza dza /
T02D1672:198a-20: aom sumbha ni sumbha dza:h'um bam ho:a'a kada dha ya /
T02D1672:198a-21: a'a kada dha pra be sha ya /
T02D1672:198a-30: h'um las rngam chen 'bar ba'i sku ston cing //
T02D1672:198a-31: 'jig rten lha chen yab yum zhabs kyis gnon ;
T02D1672:198a-32: / drag po'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston mdzad cing //
T02D1672:198a-33: dbu mang rta skad 'tsher zhing gar mdzad pa //
T02D1672:198a-34: nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od mnga' sku la rdzogs //
T02D1672:198a-35: khro rgyal 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol //
T02D1672:198a-36: 'jigs byed dbang phyug chen po dang //
T02D1672:198a-37: de bzhin tshangs pa brgya byin sogs //
T02D1672:198a-39: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha dang klu //
T02D1672:198a-40: gang dag rdzu 'phrul mthu mnga' rnams //
T02D1672:198a-41: bran mngags g-yog dang chung mar bcas //
T02D1672:198a-42: dpa' bo'i spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin //
T02D1672:198a-43: rang gi dam tshig dran byos la //
T02D1672:198a-44: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D1672:198a-46: 'od zer sngags kyis spyang byas nas //
T02D1672:198a-47: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par gsal //
T02D1672:198a-55: h'um h'um phat phat dza sv'a h'a /
T02D1672:198a-56: bdud rtsi bsam gtan dmigs nas ni //
T02D1672:198a-57: bdud rtsis kha ni dag par bya //
T02D1672:198a-58: aom gu ru tro ta kh'a hi /
T02D1672:198a-59: sa ma ya bram sha kh'a hi /
T02D1672:198a-61: bhu ta kshe tre pra ti stammbha ya kh'a hi /
T02D1672:198a-62: lhag ma kha chu'i tshogs kyis pran //
T02D1672:198b-0: dgyes pa'i longs @198b spyod rnam par rol //
T02D1672:198b-1: aom 'jig rten kun gtso mnga' mdzad pa'i //
T02D1672:198b-2: lha chen dregs byed stobs ldan pa //
T02D1672:198b-3: bde gshegs sras sogs bran mdzad pa'i //
T02D1672:198b-4: byang chub sems ldan snying rje can //
T02D1672:198b-5: dbang phyag chen po chung mar bcas //
T02D1672:198b-6: de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang //
T02D1672:198b-7: brgya byin 'dod dga' chung mar bcas //
T02D1672:198b-8: lha chen 'khor bcas tshogs rnams dang //
T02D1672:198b-9: phyogs skyong brgyad po 'khor bcas dang //
T02D1672:198b-10: klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang //
T02D1672:198b-12: dur khrod ma mo'i tshogs bcas dang //
T02D1672:198b-13: gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang //
T02D1672:198b-15: sku gsung thugs sogs spyang byas nas //
T02D1672:198b-16: rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams //
T02D1672:198b-18: mchod gtor rgyan dang bcas pa bzhes //
T02D1672:198b-19: dam tshig srungs shig dam tshig can //
T02D1672:198b-20: las la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
T02D1672:198b-22: rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig / las mdzad rdo rje bran bcas pas //
T02D1672:198b-23: zhi rgyas dbang drag las grub cing //
T02D1672:198b-24: theg chen gsang sngags bsrung ba dang //
T02D1672:198b-25: nad dang gnod sogs zhi ba dang ;
T02D1672:198b-26: / tshe dbang bkra shis spel ba dang //
T02D1672:198b-27: bde legs 'bras bu grub par mdzod //
T02D1672:198b-31: de nas sna tshogs gar gyi rgya //
T02D1672:198b-32: dga' mdzes stobs kyis bsgyur bya zhing //
T02D1672:198b-33: sna tshogs glu rnams snyan pa'i dbyangs //
T02D1672:198b-34: dpa' bo'i tshogs kyis legs par blang //
T02D1672:198b-35: rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar ba //
T02D1672:198b-36: rang gi snying gar gzhag nas su //
T02D1672:198b-37: sems can thams cad la dmigs te //
T02D1672:198b-38: smon lam rgya chen gdab par bya //
T02D1672:198b-39: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D1672:198b-40: dus kun du ni bde gyur cig / sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1672:198b-41: lam de nyid la zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1672:198b-42: ma sgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02D1672:198b-43: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar shog / kun gyis rig 'dzin bgrod byas nas //
T02D1672:198b-45: rnal 'byor gtsug lag dam tshig la //
T02D1672:199a-1: gnas par shog / dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu bya ste //
T02D1672:199a-2: ye shes lha tshogs gshegs su gsol //
T02D1672:199a-3: dam tshig gsal mnyes bsrung bar bya //
T02D1672:199a-4: gzugs brnyan dben pa'i gnas su gzhag / aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1672:199a-5: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1672:199a-6: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1672:199a-7: slar yang sems can don la dgongs //
T02D1672:199a-9: gsang mchod snying po dri ma med //
T02D1672:199a-10: tshogs gnyis gcig tu rab spyod pa //
T02D1672:199a-11: ye shes bla ma'i rtsal rdzogs don ;
T02D1672:199a-12: / dpa' bo longs spyod spyad pa'i thabs //
T02D1672:199a-13: sgrub thabs snga ma'i yan lag tu //
T02D1672:199a-14: cho ga'i dbye ba bkod byas pas //
T02D1672:199a-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob shog / sangs rgyas
T02D1672:199a-17: thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho
T02D1672:199a-19: slob dpon chen po rgyal po aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1672:199a-21: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a nanda garbha dang /
T02D1672:199a-22: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dran ba nam mkhas bsgyur ba las /
